win32.directx.d3d10effect

\ d3d10effect.d * * Windows API header module * * Placed into public domain * \

struct ID3D10EffectPassVtbl;
HACK to FIX vtbl[0] bug: This is an example HACK how to fix all interfaces which are NOT derived from IUnknown. They need the first entry in their vtbl[] point to the first virtual function.

See:
